name: NutsAndBolts
description:
Welcome To Nuts And Bolts!!!

This is a fast paced game to play when you are bored!

Collect Nuts and bolts to charge up your power to reset the lasers!

Stay alive the longest you can to get the high score.

--Controls--(Mobile Friendly)

Change Direction - Left/Right or A/D or Tap the sides of the screen

Zap Lasers - Tap/Click the button or Hit "B" Key
